<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to generate an instruction sequence that will materialise the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate value into a register. A sequence of instructions represented by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple struct is produced rather than directly emitting the instructions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order to allow this helper to be used from both the MC layer and during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction selection.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a6fa6ca43d5a47fb0edf6acd28aa85d87">InstSeq</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a163e06959afb15ae88efade9bb975e27">generateInstSeq</a>(int64&#95;t Val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to generate the generateInstSeq instruction sequence using MCInsts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a829402a713d109eae3d7945c88f33255">generateMCInstSeq</a>(int64&#95;t Val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> DestReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MCInst&gt;</a> &amp;Insts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to generate an instruction sequence that can materialize the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate value into a register using an additional temporary register. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handles cases where the constant can be generated by (ADD (SLLI X, C), X) or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (ADD&#95;UW (SLLI X, C) X). The sequence to generate X is returned. ShiftAmt is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// provides the SLLI and AddOpc indicates ADD or ADD&#95;UW.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a6fa6ca43d5a47fb0edf6acd28aa85d87">InstSeq</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a6eff34ee491c7f6124b3f21768d8d79f">generateTwoRegInstSeq</a>(int64&#95;t Val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ShiftAmt, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;AddOpc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to estimate the number of instructions required to materialise the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// given immediate value into a register. This estimate does not account for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Val&#96; possibly fitting into an immediate, and so may over-estimate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will attempt to produce instructions to materialise &#96;Val&#96; as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Size&#96;-bit immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If CompressionCost is true it will use a different cost calculation if RVC is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enabled. This should be used to compare two different sequences to determine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is more compressible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If FreeZeroes is true, it will be assumed free to materialize any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XLen-sized chunks that are 0 This is appropriate to use in instances when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the zero register can be used, e.g. when estimating the cost of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// materializing a value used by a particular operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvmatint/#a392b6c8a7962feed988bf14017205f4b">getIntMatCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompressionCost = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FreeZeroes = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace RISCVMatInt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
